docs.text: AIM AIM is a modular framework for automating machine learning workflows for algorithmic trading. Designed with re-usable components, AIM provides rapid development of complete and flexible machine learning workflows. Key Features Supports major components of the machine learning life cycle including feature engineering, targets, transformation and model generation Re-usable modular pipeline components Intelligent caching for increased efficiency and rapid testing MLFlow experiment tracking Install pip install git + https : // { token } @github . com / jmrichardson / aim . git .md-typeset h1, .md-content__button { display: none; }
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Example Workflow Copy examples folder into your project folder test the following: cd < your_project_folder > python etf_regime . py .md-typeset h1, .md-content__button { display: none; }
